events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Case has been classified under the Refund cluster based on customer's request for money back due to incorrect item.
Support agent Jennifer has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the wrong item received.
Hello! I’m Jennifer from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund for the incorrect item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so that we can verify and process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. I have attached a photo showing the item I actually received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We have approved your refund request and initiated the process. You should see the refund in your account within 5 to 7 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund update. Looking forward to receiving my money back soon.
The refund case has been marked as resolved after confirming the reimbursement process has been started successfully.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund payment or if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I have received the refund in my account today. Thank you very much for your help!
Closing this case as the refund was successfully processed and confirmed received by the customer.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to the customer to gather feedback on their refund support experience.
